subject: Global variable?
msgSnippet: Hi, I ve got two tests in one class and want to get a value from one test to the other. I ve tried varous things, used this.variable, and including accessing
messageBody:
Hi, I've got two tests in one class and want to get a value from one
test to the other.
I've tried varous things, used this.variable, and including accessing
another class, but cannot get one test to set a variable and the other
to get it.
Any clues?
Pam.
